WRITING.TEXT: I work in a backpackers hostel and I cant wait to wake up and work everyday, especially Monday as we usually get a huge flock of guests on that day for some reason. I get to meet people from all over the world, and I get to drink when I work, what more could I want from a Monday?
If you need an ear, im awake
Ahh, nothing like rendering your tastebuds fucking useless at every family pub do as a child
